bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zhong ji 腫疾 , swelling ailment, brought forth by accumulations of phlegm and food. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：諸腫，有風腫， 熱腫，水腫，濕腫，氣腫，虛腫，積腫，血腫 , “All types of swelling include wind swelling; heat swelling; water/edematose swelling; moisture swelling; qi swelling; depletion swelling; accumulation swelling ; blood swelling”.
